metadata.title: CVE-2018-20552 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Tcpreplay before 4.3.1 has a heap-based buffer over-read in packet2tree in tree.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-20552` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.3-2
No subscription required

notes.note: ccdm94> version 4.3.2 includes the fix applied by the original patch, however, additional fixes have been released since, and 4.3.2 does not include those.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.3-2').
